name: Kindle - A Flaming Hot Puzzle
description:
A physics-based puzzle game about controlling Fire.

A game for sharp-witted thinkers. Kindle is a unique approach to the 2d puzzle game genre with various surprising elements like fire and gravity. With a variety of levels, ranging from easy to extremely challenging, everyone can enjoy this game while practising their overall problem-solving skills. We hope you will enjoy this game. We will keep updating new Levels and mechanics to this game. So stay tuned.

Please let us know what you think and how to improve the game. We're also still open to name suggestions.
